sk1.name: Dual Breath
sk1.desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

sk2.name: Ice Path
sk2.desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

sk3.name: Liquid Fire
sk3.desc: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.Liquid Fire is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

sk4.name: Macropyre
sk4.desc: Jakiro lays down a line of flame in front of him, each dealing damage per second to enemy units in a wide area of effect.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
